article: Dad loved children. And he always wanted a _ family. Eventually, he got what he wanted with twelve children in the family. Without fail, he would show us all to visitors. Once, Dad _ presented the first three children in the family, Ann, Mary and Ernestine, to some visitors. Then he picked up a fourth child, and said, And this is our _ model, complete with all the improvements. And don t think that this is all, we are _ the 1953 model some time next month. But what he _ most was taking us out for a drive. On one occasion a man in a village we were passing through shouted _ that he had seen eleven people in our car, not _ Mum and Dad. _ , Dad called out over his shoulder, You _ the second baby up from the front here, Mister. Another time, Dad told us this joke, though we were not sure whether he was telling us the _ . Mum, who was a psychologist, once went to give a lecture and left Dad in charge of the _ . When Mum returned, she asked him if everything had been OK. He said everything was _ except that one of the children had been taught a lesson because he had been _ . When he pointed at the child that had been _ Mum looked at him calmly and said, That s not one of ours, dear. He _ next door.
